short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome on, one of the best Morse Code Translator (morsecode übersetzer). On this extension, you can convert text to morse code.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome on, one of the best Morse Code Translator. On this extension, you can convert text to morse code.

it’s work in real-time so the moment you type any text on the input section it’s automatically going to change your normal text into morse code.
